case_title: M/s. STANDARD CHARTERED BANK LIMITED vs MOHAMMAD ALTAF MADRASWALA and another

issues_fractured.details: No Power of Attorney or Board resolution attached.
Dispute over linking Diminishing Musharaka agreement with KIBOR.
Defendants claim payments made from August 2006 to September 2014.

plaintiff.contention: Loan disbursed and agreement terms binding.

defendants.contention: Agreement under economic duress and markup linked to KIBOR is illegal.
supporting_laws: State Bank of Pakistan Circular No.01 of 2004

issues_to_be_resolved: Whether the suit was filed by unauthorized persons.
Whether markup linked to KIBOR is recoverable under Circular No.01 of 2004.
Applicability of KIBOR to Diminishing Musharaka agreements.
Defendants' rental payments and default status.
